error.unknown: I encountered an unknown error while trying to process that action.
error.disabled: The module that action is tied to ({}) is disabled.

devembed.title: Error Dump
devembed.desc:
This error dump contains everything needed to diognose and fix an error.
*Please do not share the entire dump to a user. You can tell them in simple terms what caused the error if they wish to know however.*

userembed.title: Something's Gone Wrong...
userembed.desc:
Whoops! It would appear something has gone wrong. Can you send the following error code to our Discord server so we can diognose the issue?

`{}`
